column2: it's pricey - but where else does each bite feel like a flavor extravaganza and I get to channel my inner Top Chef Judge. Totally agree with the suggestion to avoid the sushi rolls
column3: I didn't find them as spectacular as the other small plate items. The service was stellar! Why bother with parking
column4: if you're coming here you're gonna be spending some money on food anyways so just valet it people - save yourself the stress.
